Matthew Shisler is a statistics Ph.D. student at North Carolina State University in Raleigh, NC. His research interests lie in the application of statistical methods to spatio-temporal data, rating systems, and networks.\

He is a military officer serving as an Operations Research Analyst for the U.S. Air Force and an Admissions Liaison Officer for the U.S. Air Force Academy.
